title: Excess PROJECT crafting materials
body: Does anyone know if the PROJECT cores will come back in the next project event, and if they will be compatible with the ones from the current event? (I want to know if I can save my five remaining cores to fuse them with new ones for the PROJECT Lucian skin I got from the disruption chest.)

replies.body: While I don't have any information on future content, the current materials may be disenchantable once this event is over.  More information on this is available on our[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  Hope that helps!
